work.desc: The dust has settled, the qualifiers are complete, and Europe's best have staked their claim for Euro 2024 glory in Germany. Familiar faces have impressed, rising stars have emerged, and a few legendary giants remain on the watchlist. But who will truly shine on Europe's biggest stage?

work.topic: Jude Bellingham: Real Madrid's New Zidane?
work.desc: Watching the young, wiry figure of Jude Bellingham glide across the pitch with the same effortless grace and poise once witnessed in the great Zinedine Zidane, a wave of nostalgia washes over me.

work.topic: Are the Celtics a lock to make it into the Eastern Conference finals?
work.desc: The Boston Celtics are up and running this season, sitting atop the Eastern Conference with a 9-2 record. Their impressive start comes despite the loss of key players like Marcus Smart and Robert Williams in the offseason.
